body.p: I certainly hope this letter finds you in good health. My records show it has been a while since your last visit to ACME Cancer Center. Your well being is very important to me and I would like to continue hearing about any new developments regarding your past kidney surgery and your general state of health.

Enclosed in this envelop you will find a survey with questions geared to help me gain a better idea of your current medical status. If you have some time, please complete this and return it in the enclosed pre-paid envelope. With the feedback from this survey I hope to gain a better understanding of the long-term effects of kidney surgery, which will help me to improve the quality of my future care.

In the event that your kidney tumor has recurred, I would like your permission to ask your physician for a copy of your medical records. I assure you that your information will be kept confidential in accordance with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996.
If you have any questions or would prefer to discuss the answers to this survey over the phone, please feel free to call us at .
We hope to hear from you soon.
